=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 47 Ronin Review Date: 2014/07/21 Store: Keanu Reeves (Actor), Hiroyuki Sanada (Actor), Carl Rinsch (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure Product Description: ['Keanu Reeves stars in the action-adventure epic, 47 Ronin. After a treacherous warlord kills their master and banishes their kind, 47 leaderless samurai vow to seek vengeance and reclaim their honor. This band of ronin must seek help from Kai (Reeves)—an enslaved half-breed they once rejected—in their ultimate fight for redemption in a savage world of mythic and wondrous terrors. reference_summary:
Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg) Steve McQueen (Actor), Robert Vaughn (Actor), Peter Yates (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg)', "There are bad cops and there are good cops ... and then there's Bullitt. Steve McQueen stars as Lt. Frank Bullitt in the role that made him a superstar as the hard-bitten police detective assigned to protect the star witness in a Congressional investigation. But when the witness is murdered, Bullitt mercilessly tracks a trail of lies and corruption that leads all the way to the halls of power in Washington. Steve McQueen performed his own stunts, driving the Ford Mustang in the high-speed pursuit through San Francisco that stands as one of the best and most famous car chases ever filmed.", ']]>'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Mystery & Suspense/Crime, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "Norman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert VaughnNorman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert Vaughn See more", 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 1.0), English (Dolby Digital 4.0), Spanish (Mono)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '164748', 'Director': 'Peter Yates', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 5, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve McQueen, Robert Vaughn, Jacqueline Bisset, Don Gordon, Robert Duvall', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Producers': "Philip D'Antoni, Robert Relyea", 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} What can I say about Bullitt, one of the best Steve McQueen movies of all time. I know many people like his Great Escape, and so do I, but this movie has it all. Romance, intrigue and a fantastic car chase!!! Especially because it was set in San Francisco, what a place for a car chase. The next best is our modern day "Ronin", but that's a different kind of chase. It's set in Europe, where the street are super narrow. This movie, Bullit, is a great cop movie also. So if by chance you've missed it, it needs to go on your must see list.
Carolyn Gleeson- Lover of Steve McQueen movies in any form. In fact if you like Steve, see his motorcycle documentary,"On any Sunday". Unbelievable!!! Bullitt- must see for car buffs! Luminarias Evelina Fernandez (Actor), Scott Bakula (Actor), Jose Luis Valenzuela (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy {} This is one of my favorite movies. Sort of like a Latina, "Waiting to Exhale". I love the characters and how they explore every facet, whether it's real or a myth about the way people perceive each other. It is funny, poignant and serious all at the same time. And the music is fabulous, the best soundtrack ever. This is a great rainy day movie and one that you will watch over and over again.
Carolyn G Luminarias-movie On Any Sunday - Re-Mastered-Director's Special Edition 2 Disc Set Bruce Brown (Actor, Director), Mert Lawwill (Actor) Rated: G Format: DVD Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, Special Editions ['Featuring Steve McQueen with music by the famed Dominick Fronteirie, this film is without a doubt the quintessential motorcycle film, now digitally remastered and loaded with never-before-seen extras.'] {'Genre': 'Sports', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Special Edition', 'Contributor': 'Bruce Brown, Malcolm Smith, Mert Lawwill, Steve McQueen', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 28 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Item model number': 'Relay Time: 88 min; 2Videos', 'Director': 'Bruce Brown', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Special Edition', 'Run time': '1 hour and 28 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Bruce Brown, Mert Lawwill, Malcolm Smith, Steve McQueen', 'Studio': 'Monterey Video', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Probably the great motorcycle movie every made. profile:
**User Summary:**

The user is a passionate film enthusiast with a strong preference for classic action and adventure films, particularly those featuring iconic actors like Steve McQueen. They admire character-driven narratives that intertwine romance, intrigue, and thrilling car chases, gravitating towards high production values, notable stunt work, and well-crafted suspense in captivating locales. 

Recent interactions have revealed an expanding appreciation for compelling comedies that offer rich character exploration and blend humor with poignant themes and social commentary. Their interest now extends into sports cinema, demonstrating openness to both classic and contemporary titles, valuing original works while also embracing fresh interpretations.

The user’s latest engagement highlights a keen interest in action-adventure narratives with historical and fantastical elements, reflecting a broader palate that includes diverse storytelling formats. They demonstrated a positive reception towards a recent film review that celebrated a blend of history and spectacle, further emphasizing their love for cinematic experiences that resonate with depth and excitement.

Overall, the user embodies a well-rounded film lover, seeking engaging narratives across genres while maintaining particular affection for cinematic adventures that feature iconic figures and classic storytelling styles.
